text: Ara apani yekhana theke'i bera hana na kena masajidula haramera dike apanara cehara phirana ebam tomara yekhane'i thaka na kena era dike tomadera cehara phira'o [1], yate tadera madhye yalima chara an'yadera tomadera birud'dhe bitarkera kichu na thake. Kaje'i taderake bhaya karo na ebam amake'i bhaya kara. Ara yate ami tomadera upara amara neyamata paripurna kari ebam yate tomara hidayata labha kara
